directions: In a large pot or your slow cooker heat oil and cook the onions for around 5 mins. Add garlic and sliced sausage, keep stirring until browned. If using a slow cooker place now in the cooker, setting to high.
Add tomatoes, beans and stock and bring to boil. Add thyme, paprika, carrot, potato and stock, season with pepper.
If on stovetop, cook for 1 hour on low heat and if using a slow cooker, 2-2.5 hours on high.
ingredients: 1 can 4 bean mix – no added salt, drained and rinsed
1 can butter beans, drained and rinsed
1 beef / lamb or chicken sausage, sliced, no more than 20% Fat
title: Sausage and Bean Soup Recipe
